docs.snippet: A large and highly respectable number of our citizens assembled last evening in front of the Mills House, with a band of music in attendance, to compliment the Mayor of New-York with a serenade.
docs.lead_paragraph: A large and highly respectable number of our citizens assembled last evening in front of the Mills House, with a band of music in attendance, to compliment the Mayor of New-York with a serenade.

headline.main: JAPAN AND THE JAPANESE EMBASSY.; Interesting from our Japan Correspondent. THE JAPANES EAMBASSADORS IN CALIFORNIA, THE AMERICANS IN JAPAN, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: It is now nearly three weeks since I left Kanagawa for the pupose of delivering to our Minister Resident at Yedo the letters forwarded to me from the Secretary's Department just before setting sail for the East. docs.snippet: COKE is responsible for the opinion that "Every man ought to know a little of law," and "perhaps," says A'BECKET, "the less the better"--in which latter opinion we believe all will concur whose legal lore is the result of experience in the tribunals...
docs.lead_paragraph: COKE is responsible for the opinion that "Every man ought to know a little of law," and "perhaps," says A'BECKET, "the less the better"--in which latter opinion we believe all will concur whose legal lore is the result of experience in the tribunals of this State.

headline.main: CITY GOVERNMENT.; THE BOARD OF ALDERMEN. STATISTICS OF THE FIRE DEPARTMENT--$15,000 FOR A FIRE-ESCAPE--$30,000 FOR THE RECEPTION OF THE JAPANESE EMBASSY.

docs.snippet: The happy family at Charleston has fallen into melancholy discord, the Platform being the apparently incurable source of distraction. The Southern delegations, encouraged by outside influences hostile to Mr. DOUGLAS, insist upon the insertion of a...
docs.lead_paragraph: The happy family at Charleston has fallen into melancholy discord, the Platform being the apparently incurable source of distraction. headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; The California Pony Express. Destructive Fire in New-Brunswick. A HUNDRED AND FIFTY BUILDINGS BURNED. Railroad Collision. Later from Texas. CORTINAS ONCE AGAIN IN THE FIELD. Injunctions by the Supreme Court. The St. Joseph and Maysville Road. Accident at Sandy Hook. The Texas Democratic State Convention. The Slave-Yacht Wanderer. THE CLAIM OF THE CREW ALLOWED. Resignation of Capt. Pilsbury. HIS REASONS FOR REMOVING TO ALBANY. EARTHQUAKE AT SEA.

docs.lead_paragraph: A change has been made in the time of the Pony express leaving San Francisco and St. Joseph. It will leave San Francisco every Tuesday, at 5 P.M., and arrive here on Friday of the following week; and it will leave St. Joseph every Saturday, at 11 o'clock, P. M., and arrive at San Francisco on Tuesday of the second week.

docs.snippet: The reputed birthday of St. George, who has been adopted, without any consultation whatever with him as to his proclivities in the matter, as the patron saint of England, was celebrated last evening in Delmonico's, by the benevolent society which...

headline.main: Dinner of the St. George's Society.; SPEECHES, SONGS, TOASTS AND A JOYOUS TIME IN GENERAL.

docs.lead_paragraph: The reputed birthday of St. George, who has been adopted, without any consultation whatever with him as to his proclivities in the matter, as the patron saint of England, was celebrated last evening in Delmonico's, by the benevolent society which bears his name.
